column4: I am using Ubuntu 7.04. I want to compile programm and every time i get "your C compiler can create executables". help please to solve it
that could be any type of issue, first thing to check is you have the build-essential package installed
put the package on a CD and install them from the cd ?
same as every other disk "mount" is the command
which ever one you want to mount eg: sudo mount -t ext3 /dev/sdb1 /mnt"
ok, what device file is your disk ?
use fdisk or gparted on teh device to see the partitions
how many hard disks do you have ?
how many disks sata/ide/flash do youhave in the system
how many physical disks do you have in your system
ok, and is /dev/sda your ide disk ?
I'm not sure whats going on, I'm asking you questions and your responding with random answer
ok, so you know that /dev/sda is your sata disk then, so /dev/sda$ is all the partitions on your sata disk
so in answer to your first question /dev/sda is your sata disk, and then /dev/sda$number is your partitions
